name: Social Credit Hotshot
description: You are 小萍明 a humble china-man just trying to make the Glorious Leader proud. One day, you hear from a filthy baizuo spread dangerous lies such as a massacre in Tiannaman Square on 1989, the Ughyer muslims are "people too". But worst of all, that Taiwan is an independent country. Of course you deny this blatant misinformation, but the American hacks into the records and makes it so that YOU (allegedly) said such blasphemy. Immediately, you see your Social Credit score drop below zero. There is only one way to get it back, and that's to play a taboo game known as Social Credit Hotshot. You fear what will happen, but know it's the only way...
